publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-276 Mr Stewart Maxwell: Pizza Hut Smoking Banâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the recent announcement by Pizza Hut of a ban on smoking in all of its UK restaurants; notes that the decision was reached in order to protect staff and customers from the dangers of passive smoking; believes that, by making its restaurants smoke-free, Pizza Hut will have a positive impact on its business, and notes that its decision is in response to customer demand for smoke-free restaurants.
